name: LAN to WAN Relationss
description: Addon: Monitors selected IP addresses by ping and publishes sensor data via MQTT to Home Assistant. One sensor per address. Only updates sensor when the ping changes (rounded to full ms). Requires MQTT credentials (use your Home Assistant user and password).

targets.description: List of IP addresses to ping (e.g., 8.8.8.8, 1.1.1.1)

keep_days.description: Number of days to retain ping logs (older logs will be deleted)

mqtt_host.description: MQTT broker address (usually localhost – do not change)

mqtt_port.description: MQTT broker port (default: 1883 – do not change)
